question: Write a letter to your friend. In your letter,tell him which team wondescribe the conditions on the daysay how you felt about the match
text: I hope you and your family are good. I am very excited to tell you  that last weekend I have watched a final match of the IPL league from the Patel stadium in Pune with my family.
I was glad It was the  title competition between Delhi and Mumbai. Everyone knows that Delhi is a strong  team but that day Mumbai played the game nicely to win their first title of the IPL.

We entered the cricket stadium at 3pm. I was very happy to watch my favourite players from very close. But the match was  delayed due to heavy rain which made us sad for a moment. But after the toss weather was clear and  Mumbai Indian put a big total on the board.
I was happy to watch the match with my parents moreover my favourite players performed nicely to win the game. Although, It was more fun if you were also there to enjoy this lovely moment.
I hope to see you soon.
